title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
summary: A novel about the American dream and the roaring twenties.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
summary: Explores the history and impact of Homo sapiens.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
summary: A story set in a distant future amidst a huge interstellar empire.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
summary: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends a magical school.

title: The Diary of a Young Girl
author: Anne Frank
summary: The diary of Anne Frank during her time hiding from the Nazis.

title: The Power of Habit
author: Charles Duhigg
summary: Explores the science behind why habits exist and how they can be changed.
